author: julianfoad
msg: In the "Working copy is too old" error message, say the version of
Subversion that created the WC.  This will be more helpful to users.
(svn_wc__upgrade_sdb): Use it to insert the Subversion version into the
"Working copy is too old" error message. Also tweak the wording of the
error message for an old development version, to be a bit more explanatory.

author: jnioche
msg: GORA-21 commons-lang needs a configuration in gora-core/ivy/ivy.xml
